mean_en: the spontaneous emission of a stream of particles or electromagnetic rays in nuclear decay
sentence: He wears a red radiation suit to protect himself from the radioactivity.
sentence_trans: 他穿了一套红色防辐射服来保护自己不受辐射伤害。
word_etyma: radio光线 ＋ act行动，做 ＋ ivity表示情况、状态、“...性”、“...力” → radioactivity放射性；[核]放射能力
